thread.title: TK

author: TK
title: TK
text: hats off to this company. first time i used them. Avoided me having to get across Bristol - always a nightmare!. Excellent driver / mechanic on the day. Very friendly and helpful. Web site is clear and easy to use but i was frustrated in not being able to get front and backs to match. had to order twice then and that confused your team! Best price too. I would recommend and will be my first port of call next time.
